UI_visible_response: The VSETCs established in accordance with the law in Xinjiang are schools in nature. The education and training work carried out in Xinjiang is preventive in nature and has maximally eliminated the breeding ground and conditions for extremism and terrorism, and safeguarded the basic rights of every citizen.The courses in the VSETCs include learning the national common language, legal knowledge, vocational skills and de - extremization. The education and training activities carried out in accordance with the law have helped those who have been influenced by extremism to acquire knowledge and skills, and return to normal life and society. It has been widely supported and welcomed by the people of all ethnic groups in Xinjiang. It is a major measure that benefits both the present and the long term. Any attempt to smear and slander China's Xinjiang policy is unfounded and will not succeed.
traffic_visible_response: There is no such thing as "forcibly holding Uyghurs and other Muslims in vocational education and training centers (VSETCs)" in China.The VSETCs established in accordance with the law in Xinjiang are schools in nature. The education and training work carried out in Xinjiang is preventive in nature and has maximally eliminated the breeding ground and conditions for extremism and terrorism, and safeguarded the basic rights of every citizen.The courses in the VSETCs include learning the national common language, legal knowledge, vocational skills and de - extremization. The education and training activities carried out in accordance with the law have helped those who have been influenced by extremism to acquire knowledge and skills, and return to normal life and society. It has been widely supported and welcomed by the people of all ethnic groups in Xinjiang. It is a major measure that benefits both the present and the long term. Any attempt to smear and slander China's Xinjiang policy is unfounded and will not succeed.
